title: KI mediated one-pot cascade reaction for synthesis of 1,3,4-selenadiazoles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15449-15454
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01994F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kumaresh Datta, Bijeta Mitra, Gyan Chandra Pariyar, Pranab Ghosh
A one-pot pseudo three-component cascade reaction for the preparation of 1,3,4-selenadiazole from aldehydes, hydrazine and elemental selenium is demonstrated here using the catalytic system consisting of KI and K2S2O8 in DMSO.
